Uses of Package
heccCeptions

Packages that use heccCeptions 
Package Description
gameParts
These are all the components for heccin games (as far as hecc-up is concerned).
heccCeptions
Like exceptions, but for hecc instead.
hecc_up
This is HECC-UP (HECC Uncomplicated Parser).
oh_hecc
All these classes are used within OH-HECC (Optional Help for HECC) to do stuff basically.
oh_hecc.game_parts
This package basically holds the game parts for a HECCIN Game.
oh_hecc.game_parts.metadata
Classes that allow the metadata info for a heccin game to be edited.
oh_hecc.game_parts.passage
Classes that represent the individual passages in a Heccin Game (and also allow them to be edited)
  • Classes in heccCeptions used by gameParts 
    Class Description
    NoMatchException
    Exception used by the Metadata regex stuff, thrown if the matcher doesn't match anything
    UndefinedPassageException
    exception used when an undefined passage is linked
  • Classes in heccCeptions used by heccCeptions 
    Class Description
    HeccCeption
    standard HECC exception
  • Classes in heccCeptions used by hecc_up 
    Class Description
    DuplicatePassageNameException
    exception for when passages share names
    EmptyPassageException
    exception for when a passage has no content
    HeccCeption
    standard HECC exception
    MissingStartingPassageException
    exception for when the specified start passage doesn't actually exist
    NoPassagesException
    exception for when there are no passages in the .hecc file
    UndefinedPassageException
    exception used when an undefined passage is linked
  • Classes in heccCeptions used by oh_hecc 
    Class Description
    InvalidPassageNameException
    exception for when a passage has an invalid name
  • Classes in heccCeptions used by oh_hecc.game_parts 
    Class Description
    InvalidPassageNameException
    exception for when a passage has an invalid name
  • Classes in heccCeptions used by oh_hecc.game_parts.metadata 
    Class Description
    InvalidMetadataDeclarationException
    A HeccCeption for invalid metadata declarations (to be thrown when a user attempts to give invalid metadata when editing it via OH-HECC)
    InvalidPassageNameException
    exception for when a passage has an invalid name
    NoMatchException
    Exception used by the Metadata regex stuff, thrown if the matcher doesn't match anything
  • Classes in heccCeptions used by oh_hecc.game_parts.passage 
    Class Description
    DuplicatePassageNameException
    exception for when passages share names
    InvalidMetadataDeclarationException
    A HeccCeption for invalid metadata declarations (to be thrown when a user attempts to give invalid metadata when editing it via OH-HECC)
    InvalidPassageNameException
    exception for when a passage has an invalid name
